S

serverSocket - Variable in class node.SocketHandler
The socket used to send over tcp.
SocketHandler - Class in node
Maintain all socket information
SocketHandler(int, int, int) - Constructor for class node.SocketHandler
The constructor method for the socket handler.
startMulticastReceive() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start receiving over multicast.
startMulticastSend() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start & stop the correct sockets to start sending over multicast.
startMulticastSendSocket() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start the socket to send over multicast.
startMulticastSocket() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start the socket to listen on multicast.
startReceiveTCPSocket(String) - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start the socket to receive over TCP
startSendFile() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start TCP serverSocket and return value of server socket.
startServerSocket() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start running the TCP socket.
startUdpSocket() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
Start running the UDP socket.
stopSendFile() - Method in class node.SocketHandler
End of sending file, close the server socket.
